recipe.title: Sugared Spiced Nuts
ingredients: 4 cups mixed salted roasted nuts (about 1 1/4 pound)
1 1/2 tablespoons cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice
instructions: Whisk together egg white and water in a large bowl until frothy and stir in nuts. Stir together sugar and cinnamon and stir into nuts, coating well. Spread nuts in a lightly buttered large shallow pan and bake in middle of oven until dry, about 50 minutes. Cool and break into bite-size chunks.
